--select name from sys.all_objects where type_desc='SQL_TRIGGER' SET ANSI_NULLS ON GO SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON GO CREATE TRIGGER [dbo].[Tgr_tbl_Area_VirPin] ON [dbo].[tbl_Area] AFTER Insert AS declare @Id int = 0 declare @pinsno int = 0 declare @pinsno2 varchar(2) = '01' declare @pincode varchar(6)='000000' declare @stateId int = 0 declare @stateId2 varchar(2)='00' declare @isExist int= 1 BEGIN TRY BEGIN TRANSACTION while(@isExist > 0) begin select top 1 @Id=Id, @pincode = pincode,@stateId=StateId from tbl_Area where Virpin is NULL Select @pinsno=max(PinSno) from tbl_Area where Pincode=@pincode and StateId =@stateId
set @stateId2 = case when @StateId is null or len(@StateId)=0 then '00' when len(@stateid)=1 then '0'+convert(varchar(2),@StateId) else convert(varchar(2),@StateId) end
if @pinsno is null or @pinsno = 0 begin Update tbl_Area set PinSno = 1 where Id=@Id end else begin set @pinsno2 = case when len(@pinsno)=1 then '0'+convert(varchar(2),@pinsno) else convert(varchar(2),@pinsno) end Update tbl_Area set PinSno=(@pinsno+1)where Id=@Id
end Update tbl_Area set VirPin = @stateId2+Pincode+@pinsno2 where Id=@Id --loop select @isExist = count(Id) from tbl_Area where Virpin is NULL end COMMIT TRANSACTION END TRY BEGIN CATCH ROLLBACK END CATCH
